name: The Spookey Sugary Saloon
description:
Here, have some candies for keys. :]

The Spookey Sugary Saloon was made during a 72 hours In House Game Jam by Cellar Vault Games Team.

Play as a person in a haunted house that needs to get out. Doors are locked, so you must find the keys. When you can't find any keys, you'll have to resort to "sweet spots"


Candies! Follow us for more:

More by Cellar Vault Games
